member.name: M:Abp.Runtime.Caching.Redis.ProtoBufRedisCacheSerializer.Deserialize(StackExchange.Redis.RedisValue)
member.summary: Creates an instance of the object from its serialized string representation.
member.param: String representation of the object from the Redis server.

member.name: M:Abp.Runtime.Caching.Redis.ProtoBufRedisCacheSerializer.Serialize(System.Object,System.Type)
member.summary: Produce a string representation of the supplied object.
member.returns: Returns a string representing the object instance that can be placed into the Redis cache.
